name: clamtk
tagline: An easy to use, light-weight, on-demand virus scanner for Linux systems
body:
![clamtk logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dave-theunsub/clamtk/master/images/clamtk.png)  

### Introduction  

ClamTk is a graphical front-end for ClamAV using Perl and Gtk libraries. It is designed to be an easy-to-use, lightweight, on-demand antivirus scanner for Linux systems. February 2016 marks our twelfth year!

From this page, you can download Fedora and CentOS rpms as well as Debian and Ubuntu debs. There are builds for older distributions such as Ubuntu 12.04 and CentOS 6. You can also install thunar-sendto-clamtk, nemo-sendto-clamtk, and clamtk-kde if you like to have a right-click, context menu in your file manager.

If you'd like to check the digital signature of the downloaded file first (rpm or deb), there are directions to do so in the [README](https://github.com/dave-theunsub/clamtk/blob/master/README).

A build with a new design using Gtk3 is underway.
